description:
Presea activates the Jewel Seeds, so she can attempt to open the door to the lost city of Al Hazard. Nanoha and Yuuno must accompany Lindy and Chrono to prevent this from happening. Meanwhile, Fate remains unconscious in the medical bay...
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Shukumei ga Tojiru Toki na no
This Is When Our Fates Are Sealed
宿命が閉じるときなの
